CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1977 CODE This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1977 Code, as updated through December 5, 1994, which are included herein. Sections of the 1977 Code, as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table. For provisions included in the Land Development Code, see the comparative table for same. For an accounting of provisions of the 1977 Code that were repealed or altered by the adoption of this Code, see the memorandum of substantive changes appearing after the Code Comparative Table—Ordinances. 1977 Code Section Section  this Code 1-1 1-1 1-1001 2-36 1-1002 2-925 1-1011—1-1014 2-66—2-69 1-1015 2-43 1-1021, 1-1022 2-131, 2-132 1-1023, 1-1024 2-134, 2-135 CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - ORDINANCES This table gives the location within this Code of those ordinances adopted since the 1977 Code, as updated through December 5, 1994, which are included herein. For ordinances included in the Land Development Code, see the table for same. Ordinances adopted prior to such date were incorporated into the 1977 Code, as supplemented. Ordinances adopted since December 5, 1994, and not listed herein or in the table for the Land Development Code, have been omitted as repealed, superseded or not of a general and permanent nature. *Ord. Nos. 1994-06 and 1994-22 are not repealed by adoption of the Code. The section referenced below saves such ordinance from repeal. Ordinance Number  Date Section  Section this Code 1980-102 11-22-80 2 122-107 1986-02  2- 7-86 1, 2 110-3 1988-52 STATE LAW REFERENCE TABLE This table shows the location within this Charter and Related Laws and Code, either in the text or notes following the text, of references to the Official Code of Georgia Annotated. For references in the Land Development Code, see the state law reference table for same. O.C.G.A. Section Section  this Code Ga. Const. art. IX, § II, ¶ III       R L App. A Ga. Const. art.
